content:
a University of Chicago Police Department UCPD bicycle patrolman was hit by a car on South fifty-seventh Street outside the main quad gates on Tuesday morning at about  PERIOD The driver did not stop at the stop sign and was given a citation PERIOD The policeman Jack Laughran suffered from broken ribs and was hospitalized at Northwestern Memorial Hospital according to Rudy Nimocks director of UCPD PERIOD

We expect his full recovery and return  to duty Nimocks said PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of University of Chicago PERIOD Your contributions go towards our annual website hosting costs and equipment costs PERIOD
